alert.note: Alert for Sioux (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 2:29AM CDT until June 14 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sioux County in northwestern Iowa... North central Dixon County in northeastern Nebraska... Eastern Clay County in southeastern South Dakota... South central Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... Northern Union County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 229 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Vermillion, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Union Grove State Park around 245 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Beresford, Hawarden and Alcester. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Sioux Falls.
